Seemingly made from living, animated filth, omoxes have no true anatomy, although they generally spend most of their time in roughly humanoid shapes, resembling some grim caricatures of half-melted humanoids. While scholars once believed these foul demons to be a pure, concentrated form of the corruption that suffuses the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13) and its inhabitants, in truth these demons arise from the souls of those who routinely befouled and polluted their surroundings in life. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32 **[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Omox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1112) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 63 **Perception** +22; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24 **Str** +7 **Dex** +3 **Con** +7 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 **Cleanly Vulnerability** An omox embodies filth, and they find the concept of cleanliness abhorrent. An omox subjected to an effect that cleans them, such as the tidy command of [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), takes 2d6 mental damage. They also take this damage the first time each round a creature hit by one of the omox's attacks spends actions cleaning off the filth. --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +21 **Will** +20 **HP** 395 **Immunities** acid, critical hits, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10, good 10 **Grab Weapon** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Trigger** A creature hits the omox with a melee weapon; **Effect** The omox attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the triggering creature. On a critical success, the weapon becomes subsumed within the omox's body rather than falling to the ground, from which it must be Disarmed before it can be retrieved. --- **Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 80 feet **Melee** sludge tendril +25, **Damage** 2d6+13 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid and 1d6 evil and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Ranged** slime ball +24 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d4+13 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid and 1d6 evil and slime trap **Divine Innate Spells** DC 32 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **5th** [Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53) (at will), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309) **Rituals** DC 32 - **1st** [Abyssal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=21) **Liquid Leap** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Requirements** The omox is in a space of liquid; **Effect** The omox teleports from its current space to any unoccupied space of liquid within 120 feet. **Slime Trap** A creature hit by an omox's slime ball must attempt a DC 32 Reflex save.
**Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute or until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 35).
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the target is also [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for the same duration. **Smother** **Requirements** The omox has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The demon flows over the grabbed creature, covering it in oozing acidic slime. The creature must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or else it becomes [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) and must hold its breath or begin [suffocating](/Rules.aspx?ID=468). These effects lasts as long as the omox has the creature grabbed.
